users.name: Alice
users.preferences: Love romantic comedies, feel-good movies with happy endings, strong character development, and heartwarming stories. Enjoy films like The Princess Bride, La La Land, and romantic dramas.
users.dislikes: Horror movies, excessive violence, sad endings, zombie films, and anything too dark or depressing

users.name: Bob
users.preferences: Sci-fi enthusiast who loves complex plots, technological themes, mind-bending concepts, and futuristic settings. Big fan of movies like Inception, The Matrix, and cerebral thrillers.
users.dislikes: Romance-heavy films, musicals, slow pacing, and overly sentimental movies

users.name: Charlie
users.preferences: Action movie fan who enjoys superhero films, adventure stories, fast-paced entertainment, and epic battles. Love Marvel movies, war films, and high-octane thrillers.
users.dislikes: Slow burns, art house films, excessive dialogue, and period dramas without action

users.name: Dana
users.preferences: Appreciates psychological thrillers, mystery movies with plot twists, dark themes, sophisticated narratives, and character studies. Enjoys films like The Silence of the Lambs and Memento.
users.dislikes: Predictable plots, children's movies, overly happy endings, and simple stories
